org.modelio.gproject.fragment

Class AbstractFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modelio.gproject.fragment.AbstractFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IProjectFragment
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExmlFragment, RamcFileFragment, UrlFragment

    public abstract class AbstractFragment
extends Object
implements IProjectFragment
    Abstract implementation of a project fragment.

      • MMVERSION_FILE_NAME

        protected static final String MMVERSION_FILE_NAME
        File name of the file containing the metamodel versions.

        To be used by IProjectFragment.getMetamodelVersion() in most cases.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • getRoots

        public final Collection<MObject> getRoots()
        Get the root elements of the fragment.

        Returns an empty list as long as there is no open repository. In the other case delegates to doGetRoots().

        If the doGetRoots() fails to get the roots calls setDown(Throwable).

        Specified by:
        getRoots in interface IProjectFragment
        Returns:
        the root elements of the fragment.

                  throws IOException

        delete in interface IProjectFragment

      • mount

        public final void mount(GProject aProject,
                        IModelioProgress aMonitor)
        Mount a fragment.

        The process is:

        • set the state as MOUNTING
        • set the current project
        • call doMountInitRepository(IModelioProgress)
        • connect the repository to the session
        • call doMountPostConnect(IModelioProgress)
        • set the state as UP
        Subclasses must implement doMountInitRepository(IModelioProgress) and may implement doMountPostConnect(IModelioProgress).
        Specified by:
        mount in interface IProjectFragment
        Parameters:
        aProject - the project where the fragment is mount.
        aMonitor - the progress monitor to use for reporting progress to the user. It is the caller's responsibility to call done() on the given monitor. Accepts null, indicating that no progress should be reported and that the operation cannot be cancelled.

      • unmount

        public final void unmount()
        Description copied from interface: IProjectFragment
        Release all resources allocated by the fragment.
        Specified by:
        unmount in interface IProjectFragment

      • reconfigure

        public void reconfigure(FragmentDescriptor fd,
                        IModelioProgress aMonitor)
        Default implementation.

        Unregister itself and install a new fragment if the URI is different. Replaces its properties by the given ones.

        Specified by:
        reconfigure in interface IProjectFragment
        Parameters:
        aMonitor - the progress monitor to use for reporting progress to the user. It is the caller's responsibility to call done() on the given monitor. Accepts null, indicating that no progress should be reported and that the operation cannot be cancelled.
        fd - the new fragment configuration

      • assertMount

        protected final void assertMount()
                          throws IllegalStateException
        Check the fragment is mount and throws an exception if not.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the fragment is not mount.

      • doDelete

        protected void doDelete(IModelioProgress monitor)
        Hook for sub classes called by delete() in first place.

        Does nothing by default. The fragment is still mounted and all files still exist but will be deleted on return. Sub classes may do more cleaning.

        Parameters:
        monitor - the progress monitor to use for reporting progress to the user. It is the caller's responsibility to call done() on the given monitor. Accepts null, indicating that no progress should be reported and that the operation cannot be cancelled.

      • doUnmountPostProcess

        protected void doUnmountPostProcess()
                             throws IOException
        Hook called by unmount() after having disconnected the repository from the modeling session.

        May be redefined by subclasses to clean resources.

        Throws:
        IOException - if some errors should be reported. The unmount will not be cancelled.

      • doMountPostConnect

        protected void doMountPostConnect(IModelioProgress mon)
                           throws IOException
        Hook called by mount(GProject, IModelioProgress) after having connected the repository to the session.

        Does nothing by default. Subclasses may redefine it to populate the repository.

        Parameters:
        mon - the progress monitor to use for reporting progress to the user. It is the caller's responsibility to call done() on the given monitor. Accepts null, indicating that no progress should be reported and that the operation cannot be cancelled.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of failure.

      • doGetRoots

        protected abstract Collection<MObject> doGetRoots()
                                           throws IOException
        Get the root elements of the fragment.

        This method is called by getRoots() that ensures there is an open repository.

        Returns:
        the root elements of the fragment.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of failure.

      • doInitAccessManager

        protected abstract IAccessManager doInitAccessManager()
        Initialize the access manager.
        Returns:
        the access manager.

      • doMountInitRepository

        protected abstract IRepository doMountInitRepository(IModelioProgress aMonitor)
                                              throws IOException,
                                                     FragmentAuthenticationException
        Instantiate the repository.

        This is a hook called by mount(GProject, IModelioProgress). The implementation must just instantiate the IRepository without opening it.

        The implementation must not call done() on the given monitor and must leave a non negligible part of the progress unconsumed.

        Parameters:
        aMonitor - the progress monitor to use for reporting progress to the user.

        The implementation must not call done() the given monitor and must leave a non negligible part of the progress unconsumed.

        Accepts null, indicating that no progress should be reported and that the operation cannot be cancelled.

        Returns:
        the instantiated repository.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of failure.
        FragmentAuthenticationException - in case of authentication failure

      • getAuthData

        protected final IAuthData getAuthData()
        Returns:
        the fragment authentication data.

      • getRepositoryErrorSupport

        protected final org.modelio.gproject.fragment.AbstractFragment.RepositoryListener getRepositoryErrorSupport()
        Get the error handler that should be attached as listener to the repository when mount.
        Returns:
        the error handler

      • setDown

        public final void setDown(Throwable error)
        Set the fragment in "down" state, with the cause.

        Fires a FRAGMENT_DOWN event.

        Specified by:
        setDown in interface IProjectFragment
        Parameters:
        error - the cause of down state

      • checkMmVersion

        protected void checkMmVersion()
                       throws FragmentMigrationNeededException,
                              IOException
        Check the metamodel version against Modelio metamodel version.

        Returns normally if the fragment may be directly open else throws an exception.

        Throws:
        IOException - if the metamodel version does not allow the fragment to be open.
        FragmentMigrationNeededException - if the fragment needs to be migrated before opening.

      • getLastMmVersion

        protected static final VersionDescriptors getLastMmVersion()
        Get the last available metamodel version descriptor.
        Returns:
        the last metamodel version.

      • migrate

        public void migrate(GProject project,
                    IModelioProgress aMonitor)
             throws FragmentAuthenticationException,
                    IOException
        The default implementation does nothing if version is compatible and fails with the same exception as checkMmVersion() in the other case.
        Specified by:
        migrate in interface IProjectFragment
        Parameters:
        project - the project where the fragment would be mount.
        aMonitor - the progress monitor to use for reporting progress to the user. It is the caller's responsibility to call done() on the given monitor. Accepts null, indicating that no progress should be reported and that the operation cannot be cancelled.
        Throws:
        FragmentAuthenticationException - in case of authentication failure
        IOException - in case of failure

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Returns the name, type and state of the fragment.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
